infos.value: At each Waypoint, you will find plenty of information essential for your assault. Be sure to survey properly beforehand.
It is crucial that you have an accurate understanding of your enemy's strengths and weaknesses before attacking a Waypoint.
Similarly, each of your Guild members will have situations where they excel and ones they should avoid.
Confronting the enemy's army with flexible Formations and adaptable strategies will be the key to toppling every Waypoint.
◆Castle Warfare◆

◆Castle Warfare◆
During this mode, you will work together with your Guild to take down Waypoints stationed around a map by defeating enemy parties.
◆About Waypoints 1◆

◆About Waypoints◆
Tap a Waypoint icon to move to a Waypoint.
◆About Waypoints 2◆
While at a Waypoint, you can confirm enemy parties and details about the Waypoint.<color=#00ffff> By tapping and holding a party,</color> you can reveal more information.
◆Battles◆

◆Battles◆
All battles will be conducted through Auto Battle. Once all of the enemy parties in a Waypoint have been defeated, your attack on that Waypoint is complete.
◆About Difficulty 1◆

◆About Difficulty◆
During thefirst occurrence of a battle at a Waypoint, a difficulty must be selected.
◆About Difficulty 2◆
<color=#00ffff>The enemy's level will change based on the difficulty.</color> Once a battle has taken place, the difficulty of that Waypoint cannot be change during the same day.
◆Action Count◆

◆Action Count◆
Taking part in a battle will reduce your Action Count by one. Parties and members can no longer take part in battles once their Action Count reaches zero.
◆Resetting◆

◆Resetting◆
Consumed Action Counts, the state of each Waypoint, and the statuses of all ally and enemy parties will be reset each day at 00:00, World Time (PST).
◆Battle Points◆

◆Battle Points◆
At the end of a battle, you will receive points based on the number of enemies defeated, the difficulty, and the size of the Waypoint.
◆About Rewards◆

◆About Rewards◆
You can receive various rewards based on the amount of points received in each of the battles and the total amount of points gathered.
◆Castle Warfare◆
Would you like to hear the explanation for Castle Warfare?
Yes
No
